subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Looking like a lumberjack with an ax to grind, Adam Kleeberger and his gigantic beard lit up social media sites after he inspired Canada's opening World Cup win.
snippet: Looking like a lumberjack with an ax to grind, Adam Kleeberger and his gigantic beard lit up social media sites after he inspired Canada's opening World Cup win.
